objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><linearGradient id='bgGradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#0A0A0A'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#212121'/></linearGradient><radialGradient id='spotLight' cx='50%' cy='30%' r='70%' fx='50%' fy='30%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#2A2A2A' stop-opacity='1'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#111111' stop-opacity='0.1'/></radialGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#spotLight)'/><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='none' stroke='#777777' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='none' stroke='#777777' stroke-width='1'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='200' fill='none' stroke='#777777' stroke-width='1'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><line x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' stroke='#999999' stroke-width='1'/><line x1='1080' y1='0' x2='0' y2='1080' stroke='#999999' stroke-width='1'/></g><g opacity='0.4'><rect x='0' y='760' width='1080' height='320' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/></g><g opacity='0.2'><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='160' fill='#000000'/></g></svg>

objects.text: Japanese Quartz Movement | Stainless Steel | 3ATM Waterproof

product_details.description: ⌚Movement: Japanese imported quartz analog movement and battery, provide precise time and long-term running. The watch can be used for more than 1 years. ⌚Material: The strap is made of stainless steel, comfortable and soft and breathable. Mineral glasses, 304 steel case, Suit for all kinds of occasions. ⌚Sports chronograph: Multifunctional sub-dial can work, chronograph, calendar, run seconds. Provide you with multi-function purpose use. ⌚3ATM waterproof: This watch is waterproof 30m, can withstand daily splash or short immersion in water, but not swimming and showering, diving or snorkeling. ☎After sales service: Each product has 1-year after sales service. If you have any questions about the product, please contact me immediately and we will give you a satisfactory solution. Item width - 4.2 centimeters ** Clasp type - Push Button Foldover Clasp With Safety ** Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
The banner showcases a premium product layout designed for a high-end chronograph stainless steel watch. At the top, a bold heading ("heading") in uppercase with a golden beige tone draws the viewer’s attention against a dramatically lit, dark radial gradient background. Just below, the subheading ("subheading") offers a clean and bright white text emphasizing the product type. Centrally placed is the product image ("product_image"), large and detailed, portraying a sleek black stainless steel watch. Beneath the image, a muted gray descriptive line ("description") highlights technical features. At the bottom, the price ("price") is prominently displayed in large bold golden beige text, followed by a rectangular beige call-to-action button ("cta_background" + "cta") with black text.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #0A0A0A → #212121
- Spotlight Radial: #2A2A2A to #111111 (with opacity effects)
- Text & Elements:
  - Golden Beige: #CEB18C (Used in heading, price, CTA background)
  - White: #FFFFFF (Used in subheading)
  - Light Gray: #CCCCCC (Used in description)
  - Black: #000000 (CTA text)
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern wristwatch dominated by a refined monochromatic black-to-gray gradient. The primary color is a deep gunmetal black (#1C1C1C), strongly used on the metallic band and the case. Complementing this is a gradient slate gray dial (#3A3A3A to #707070), which subtly highlights the chronograph sub-dials (#B0B0B0) using radial brushing. The metallic sheen across surfaces creates a reflective quality, blending light and shadow to emphasize depth and sophistication. For an advertisement banner, use a palette of #1C1C1C (Gunmetal Black), #3A3A3A (Slate Gray), #707070 (Steel Gray), and #B0B0B0 (Silver Gray) for a luxurious and elegant visual appeal.
